dc:title: On Pilgrimage - September 1980
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A series of brief diary entries about phone calls, Masses, shows on TV, operas, books she's reading, recollections of friends and times past. A quote from St. Augustine on the love of God.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 917 1980-09-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
